summary.span: 提供一个对象模型，该模型允许您使用 以动态方式构造与 WF 设计器和运行时交互的活动。

span.span: Provides an object model that allows you to construct activities dynamically that interface with the WF designer and runtime using .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ，您无需创建新类型即可创建新活动。With you can create new activities without creating new types. 及 中与其关联的 XAML 支持，允许在 XAML 中定义新的参数并且无需编译 XAML 即可实现与主机的绑定。 with its associated XAML support in allows new arguments to be defined in XAML and bound by the host without requiring XAML to be compiled.
